DOC.brief_title: 6 Minute Push & 30 Second Sprint Tests Reliability & Relationship Fitness , Participation , & Environmental Assessments
DOC.criteria: least 1 year postinjury able selfpropel manual wheelchair spinal cord injury C5 T5 spinal cord injury C5 T5 spinal cord injury severity AIS D unstable angina myocardial infarction within past month rest heart rate > 120 systolic blood pressure > 180 mm Hg , diastolic blood pressure > 100 mm HG
